description:
Sr Manager Brand Activation & Partnerships (Hybrid)

At Nespresso we place people and specialty coffee at the heart of what we do. As part of our team, you'll be empowered to inspire, care, act, and innovate to reach your full potential and reimagine what coffee can be. We're committed to delivering an exceptional coffee experience that elevates our community, suppliers, farmers, and each other, channeling our growth-minded spirit to set new standards in global coffee culture. Quality, sustainability, diversity and inclusion are core to who we are and critical to our vision of driving positive change. Throughout our factories, boutiques, and office locations, Nespresso careers are brimming with first-rate opportunities to push the boundaries of coffee exploration.

POSITION SUMMARY:

The Sr Manager Brand Activation & Partnerships is tasked with strategically amplifying the brand's presence in the US by spearheading integrated communications efforts. This role plays a pivotal part in shaping and executing impactful brand strategies, leveraging partnerships & experiential marketing to drive awareness, engagement, and market share.

This role requires a dynamic individual with a strategic mindset, creative flair, and a track record of driving successful brand activation initiatives. The position will be hybrid to our Corporate HQ in Manhattan, NYC and can expect to travel up to 15% of time annually.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Communications Strategy & Campaign Design

Responsible for shaping upstream global communications priorities , provides insights and recommendations based on market trends and consumer behavior
Tailors global campaigns to local needs, considering cultural nuances and preferences. Determines level of local participation in annual global integrated activity plan (IAP)
Leads team of managers responsible for PR, Communication Planning, and Experiential Marketing to steward results-driven planning and execution
Develops concise and well-crafted briefs informed by insights for agency partners and internal stakeholders & collaborates with Creative and Media colleagues to deliver a consistent message in increasingly innovative ways
Establishes an always-on communication approach to maintain brand relevance and address consumer needs between and on top of major campaigns
Collaborates with agency partners and Nespresso Data and Insights team to utilize data-driven approaches to optimize strategies, tactics, and ROI

Brand Partnerships

Responsible for identifying, negotiating, and managing equity-building partnerships with key celebrities, entertainment properties, and tastemakers
Ensures collaborations align with brand values and contribute to overall marketing objectives
Collaborates closely with Creative and Media and Influencer team to drive consistency and coherence across activations

Experiential

Leads the conceptualization and execution of immersive brand experiences. Staffs team with a hospitality-first mindset to ensure flawless execution
Designs measurement plan in collaboration with Data & Insights Team to inform continuous improvement and maximize resonance of brand's physical presence outside of boutique and retail network

REQUIREMENTS:

Bachelor's Degree Required, Master’s degree preferred
6+ years marketing brand management experience
2+ years’ experience leading a team, preferred
Experience developing full-funnel communications plans
Experience in CPG / luxury goods is a plus

SKILLS:

Strong understanding of global and local marketing dynamics
Strategic thinker understanding both short- and long-term business consequences of all decisions
Demonstrated ability to influence and align cross-functional teams
Skilled at developing and delivering business cases to justify significant investment

The approximate pay range for this position is $ 165,000- $185,000 base. Please note that the pay range provided is a good faith estimate for the position at the time of posting. Final compensation may vary based on factors including but not limited to knowledge, skills, and abilities as well as geographic location.

Nestle offers performance-based incentives and a competitive total rewards package, which includes a 401k with company match, healthcare coverage and a broad range of other benefits. Incentives and/or benefits packages may vary depending on the position. Learn more at:
